OOC: Yup, Soundwave/Stalker will never return, sadly.  Sorry Cyberwolf, but 
when he became Stalker(a bit of a mode by me) he lost all organic parts and 
tranformed solely into a tank. Oh, and JP, if you can, answer my post about 
the Efrafans wanting to join the preds.
